name: Shadeshift
description:
- WASD or arrow keys to move

- Click to toggle flashlight

- P for pause menu

Manifest objects with light and shadows — what you can't see isn't real. 

The code, graphics, sound effects and music were all made by hand, and no external assets were used.

Submission for the Brackeys 2022 game jam with the theme of "it's not real."

Link to solutions (not necessarily the only ones)
